regular.name: The Exterminator
regular.detail: Slow (each turn can either move or attack but not both)
regular.author: Luca Oleastri

regular.name: The Dark Destroyer
regular.detail:
Destroy any card when this enters play.
Slow (each turn can either move or attack but not both).
regular.author: Luca Oleastri

regular.name: Stormfalcon
regular.detail: Normal spaceship.
regular.author: Luca Oleastri

regular.name: Titan
regular.detail: Slow (each turn can either move or attack but not both)
regular.author: Luca Oleastri

regular.name: Explosive Missile
regular.detail: Normal missile.
regular.author: Gabriel Stiernström

regular.name: Fast Missile
regular.detail: Fast (can move the first turn).
regular.author: Gabriel Stiernström

regular.name: EMP Missile
regular.detail: Destroys Energy Shield or paralyzes spaceship (turn the card and it cannot do anything until repaired).
regular.author: Gabriel Stiernström

regular.name: Nuclear Missile
regular.detail:
Slow (each turn can either move or attack but not both).
Damage goes through shield.
regular.author: Gabriel Stiernström

regular.name: Full Attack
regular.detail: +1 attack value of your spaceships (not missiles or cannons).
regular.author: Luca Oleastri

regular.name: Good Karma
regular.detail: Draw 3 extra cards in your draw phase, then after your draw phase discard 1 card from your hand.
regular.author: Luca Oleastri

regular.name: Neutralization
regular.detail:
No other duration card has any effect.
Remove from play to destroy another duration card.
regular.author: Evgenii Baranov

regular.name: Over Capacity
regular.detail:
You have no maximum hand size.
In your action phase you may look at and take to your hand bottom row station cards.
regular.author: Luca Oleastri

regular.name: Excellent work
regular.detail:
Put down this card as an extra station card.
[ OR ] Draw 3 cards.
regular.author: Luca Oleastri

regular.name: Supernova
regular.detail: All cards except station cards are destroyed. Each player receives 3 station damage.
regular.author: Igor Zhuravlov

regular.name: Target Missed
regular.detail: Play this card directly during enemy attack from spaceship (not collision, missile or cannon) to make the attack fail.
regular.author: Luca Oleastri

regular.name: Missiles Launched
regular.detail: Find 2 missile cards (red cards) from your draw or discard pile and play them without cost. Shuffle the draw pile if searched.
regular.author: Gabriel Stiernström

regular.name: Perfect Plan
regular.detail: Search for a card from the draw pile, discard pile or station cards and put it into your hand. Shuffle the draw pile if searched.
regular.author: Chin Leong TEOH

regular.name: Pursuiter
regular.detail: Can after first turn be sacrificed instead of attacking to deal 4 damage to target in same zone (collision).
regular.author: Luca Oleastri

regular.name: Grand Opportunity
regular.detail: Draw 5 cards and then discard 1 card from your hand.
regular.author: Luca Oleastri

regular.name: Energy Shield
regular.detail: Protects base station. (You can only have one Energy Shield in play at the same time.)
regular.author: Marco A. Aguilar

regular.name: Defense Cannon
regular.detail:
Normal cannon.
(Defense cards cannot move)
regular.author: Gabriel Stiernström

regular.name: Trigger-Happy Joe
regular.detail: Can attack 2 times per turn.
regular.author: Luca Oleastri

regular.name: Thunderbolt
regular.detail: Normal spaceship.
regular.author: Luca Oleastri

regular.name: The Gladiator
regular.detail: Normal spaceship.
regular.author: Luca Oleastri

regular.name: The Shade
regular.detail: The Shade can only be attacked if it attacked the previous turn.
regular.author: Luca Oleastri

regular.name: Hunter
regular.detail: Fast (can move the first turn).
regular.author: Luca Oleastri

regular.name: Small Repair Ship
regular.detail:
Can instead of doing attack repair 1 station damage or 3 other damage.
Fast (can move the first turn).
regular.author: Luca Oleastri

regular.name: Big Repair Ship
regular.detail: Can instead of doing attack repair 1 station damage or 5 other damage.
regular.author: Luca Oleastri

regular.name: Luck
regular.detail:
Counter target card costing 2 or less.
[ OR ] Draw 2 cards.
regular.author: Vasyl Duda

regular.name: Battlestar
regular.detail: Normal spaceship.
regular.author: Luca Oleastri

regular.name: Avoid
regular.detail: Discard this card from table to counter card being played.
regular.author: Olena Pantiukh

regular.name: Disturbing Sensor
regular.detail:
· Enemy missiles can't move or attack.
· If opponent after draw phase has more   than 1 card in hand, he or she           discards a card.
regular.author: Luca Oleastri

regular.name: Fatal Error
regular.detail: Destroy any card in play with action cost X.
regular.author: David Rajecky

regular.name: Deadly Sniper
regular.detail:
Long distance shooter.
(Can after the first turn shoot targets in enemy zone from home zone)
regular.author: Luca Oleastri

regular.name: Discovery
regular.detail: Draw 3 cards and the opponent draws 2 cards. [ OR ] Discard 1 card and the opponent discards 2 cards.
regular.author: Vitaliy Sokol

regular.name: The Liberator
regular.detail: Normal spaceship.
regular.author: Luca Oleastri

regular.name: Destiny Decided
regular.detail: You cannot play any card. The opponent can only play 1 card during their turn and this card cannot be an event (orange) card.
regular.author: Sébastien Decoret

regular.name: Sabotage
regular.detail: Opponent draws 1 card. See the cards from the opponents hand and then discard 1 card from hand or flipped station card.
regular.author: Luca Oleastri

theSwarm.name: Carrier
theSwarm.detail: Can after first turn, once per turn, send out 3 Drones (from discard and/or draw pile). The Drones are placed in the same zone as Carrier.
theSwarm.author: Mohamed Ali

theSwarm.name: Drone
theSwarm.detail: If played from hand: you may draw a card.
theSwarm.author: Lionel Alvergnas

theSwarm.name: Toxic gas
theSwarm.detail: Deal 1 damage to enemy station at the start of your draw phase. Shields protects but receives 2 damage instead of 1.
theSwarm.author: Anton Medvedev

theSwarm.name: Fusion Ship
theSwarm.detail: After first turn instead of attack: Replace this and 2 spaceships in same zone by one spaceship from draw pile.
theSwarm.author: Luca Oleastri

theSwarm.name: Shield
theSwarm.detail: Protects base station. (You can have several Shield in play at the same time.)
theSwarm.author: Marco A. Aguilar

theSwarm.name: Alien Missile
theSwarm.detail:
Slow (each turn can either move or attack but not both).
Damage goes through shield.
theSwarm.author: Alex Golke

theSwarm.name: Acid Projectile
theSwarm.detail: If played from hand: you may draw a card. Fast (can move and be used the first turn).
theSwarm.author: James Thew

theSwarm.name: Paralyzer
theSwarm.detail: If shooting a spaceship the target gets paralyzed (turn the card and it cannot do anything until repaired).
theSwarm.author: Luca Oleastri

theSwarm.name: Destroy Duration
theSwarm.detail: Destroy a duration card [ OR ] Draw 2 cards.
theSwarm.author: Victor Habbick

theSwarm.name: Base Command Link
theSwarm.detail: Draw 2 extra cards in your draw phase.
theSwarm.author: Yvonne Less

theSwarm.name: Revive Procedure
theSwarm.detail: Bring back 1 or 2 cards from your discard to your hand. The total sum of the action cost of the card(s) chosen cannot be more than 6.
theSwarm.author: Jukka Nieminen

theSwarm.name: Time Warp
theSwarm.detail: Cards cost 3 more actions to play (affects both players).
theSwarm.author: Sergey Nivens

theSwarm.name: Repair Ship
theSwarm.detail: Can repair 3 damage to spaceship or 1 damage to station.
theSwarm.author: Aliaksandr Kukharski

theSwarm.name: Disturbing Signals
theSwarm.detail: Enemy missiles can't move or attack.
theSwarm.author: Kiyoshi T. Segundo

theSwarm.name: Collision Skill
theSwarm.detail: Your spaceships can now do collision instead of attack (your spaceship are destroyed in the attack) with 3 damage.
theSwarm.author: Jukka Nieminen

theSwarm.name: Drone Leader
theSwarm.detail: Attack value of X is equal to the number of Drone cards you have in play.
theSwarm.author: Mohamed Ali

theSwarm.name: Sacrifice
theSwarm.detail: Both players need to sacrifice a card in play (if they have).
theSwarm.author: Gabriel Stiernström

theSwarm.name: Nitro
theSwarm.detail: Your spaceships are fast (they can move the first turn they enter play).
theSwarm.author: Aliaksandr Kukharski

unitedStars.name: Mega Shield
unitedStars.detail: Protects base station. Repair itself 3 damage each draw phase.
unitedStars.author: Marco A. Aguilar

unitedStars.name: Repair Shield
unitedStars.detail: Protects base station. Repair 5 damage, 1 damage to station [ OR ] discard to fully repair any spaceship anywhere.
unitedStars.author: Marco A. Aguilar

unitedStars.name: Energy Source
unitedStars.detail: Each draw phase gets 2 counters, remove counters in your action phase to receive extra actions. Starts with 2 counters.
unitedStars.author: Teodoro Tarrascusa

unitedStars.name: Secret Deposit
unitedStars.detail: In your action phase: hide cards from hand under this and/or pick up cards hidden. If destroyed cards return to hand.
unitedStars.author: Luca Oleastri

unitedStars.name: Déjà Vu
unitedStars.detail: Take a card from your discard pile and put it to your hand.
unitedStars.author: Sébastien Decoret

unitedStars.name: Obstacles
unitedStars.detail: Players cannot draw and not mill until your next action phase.
unitedStars.author: Luca Oleastri

unitedStars.name: Meteor Shower
unitedStars.detail: 1 damage to everything in your draw phase. Remove from play to make 1 damage to everything (shield protects station).
unitedStars.author: Bram Janssens

unitedStars.name: Great Disturbance
unitedStars.detail: Enemy duration cards does not work.
unitedStars.author: Sébastien Decoret

unitedStars.name: Surprise Attack
unitedStars.detail: 3 damage to a single spaceship.
unitedStars.author: Luca Oleastri

unitedStars.name: Electrocution
unitedStars.detail: Paralyze all spaceships, destroys all shields and destroys all missiles.
unitedStars.author: Dmytro Tolokonov

unitedStars.name: Transformation
unitedStars.detail: Place on spacehip. In your next draw phase fully repair and then switch the attack and defense value of the spaceship.
unitedStars.author: Daniela Mangiuca

unitedStars.name: Moment of Peace
unitedStars.detail: Attacks from spaceships and missiles are disabled until your next turn.
unitedStars.author: Sébastien Decoret

unitedStars.name: Orders Cancelled
unitedStars.detail: Counter a card, then discard a card.
unitedStars.author: Jukka Nieminen

unitedStars.name: Brilliance
unitedStars.detail: Draw 3 cards. Then from your hand discard 1 card and put another card on top of your draw pile.
unitedStars.author: Sébastien Decoret

unitedStars.name: Good Plan
unitedStars.detail: Look at the top 10 cards from your draw pile, place 2 cards to your hand and the rest to the bottom of your draw pile.
unitedStars.author: Sébastien Decoret

unitedStars.name: Cluster Nuke
unitedStars.detail: Slow. Deals 2 damage extra to all cards in same zone and 1 to the station when used or destroyed.
unitedStars.author: Luca Oleastri

unitedStars.name: Deploy Starship
unitedStars.detail: Discard 3 cards from play to find Starship from anywhere and play it for free.
unitedStars.author: Sébastien Decoret

unitedStars.name: Starhunter
unitedStars.detail: Receives a +1 +1 token in each draw phase.
unitedStars.author: Luca Oleastri

unitedStars.name: Hacker
unitedStars.detail: After first turn, can take control of enemy spaceship as long as this exist. If the spaceship gets destroyed it can take control of another ship.
unitedStars.author: Muhammad Annurmal

unitedStars.name: Indestructible Viper
unitedStars.detail: Instead of being destroyed remains at 1 life and gets paralyzed.
unitedStars.author: Luca Oleastri

unitedStars.name: Resource ship
unitedStars.detail: Instead of attack can be moved to be an extra station card.
unitedStars.author: Luca Oleastri

unitedStars.name: Scout
unitedStars.detail: Instead of attack: you may draw a card.
unitedStars.author: Luca Oleastri

unitedStars.name: Duplication
unitedStars.detail: Copy card on table. It becomes an exact copy of that card including the amount of actions it cost to play it.
unitedStars.author: Andrei Dzemidzenka

unitedStars.name: Starship
unitedStars.detail: Cost 1 less for each card you have in the table. Slow (each turn can either move or attack but not both).
unitedStars.author: Caroline Atkinson

unitedStars.name: Death Ray, Charged
unitedStars.detail: Attack value of X. Place on Starship. Starship can launch next turn instead of doing normal attack. Long distance. Damage goes through shield.
unitedStars.author: Martin Capek

unitedStars.name: Station Repair
unitedStars.detail: Repair 1 station damage each draw phase. Discard to repair 1 station damage.
unitedStars.author: Daniela Mangiuca

unitedStars.name: Release of Energy
unitedStars.detail: For each X: draw 1 card or discard the top 2 cards of opponents draw pile.
unitedStars.author: Kitsana Baitoey

unitedStars.name: Time Travel Portal
unitedStars.detail: In your draw phase add a counter to this card. Remove 3 counters to take an extra turn after your turn.
unitedStars.author: Jukka Nieminen

unitedStars.name: Satellite
unitedStars.detail:
Draw 1 extra card in your draw phase.
Remove from play to draw 2 cards.
unitedStars.author: Konstantin Shaklein
